title: Tyga and Khloé Kardashian Encourages Prayers For Lamar Odom
text:
> Entertainment Tyga and Khloé Kardashian Encourages Prayers For Lamar Odom Tyga encourages people to give more prayers, along with Khloé Kardashian, to help support Lamar Odom as he continues his recovery. iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
